nodes.title: Change git prompt colors to reflect LoC delta
nodes.description:
I'm about to go through a series of refactors, and want a quick visual indication of whether I'm adding or removing lines of code overall. This change shows whether I'm red or green from the upstream branch and from HEAD.

It's a bit slow. I'd like to speed it up if this works out.
